entries.title: Forget The New MacBook Pro, Apple Has Something Better
entries.description: Looking for a new MacBook Pro? Before you decide, you should look at your other options, because Apple has a better option

entries.title: NASA Rover Discovers Gemstone On Mars
entries.description: A research team using new methods to analyze data from NASA's Mars rover was able to verify that fractures contained opal, on Earth a gemstone formed by the alteration of silicon-dioxide by water.

entries.title: The 9 Best Fitness Trackers And Smartwatches You Can Buy Right Now
entries.description: A new year means a new year, they say. So, which is the best tech to help with your resolutions?

entries.title: ChatGPT3 — Let The Generative AI Revolution Begin
entries.description: Beyond the prowess of ChatGPT3, the underlying impact of the technology - generative AI - on business is only just coming into focus.

entries.title: What ‘Marvel Snap’ Collection Level Do You Need To Hit To Get All Pool 3 Cards?
entries.description: In Marvel Snap, once you hit pool 3, you are in the long, long stretch of dozens of cards that you will get every four caches or so on average, but the caches are further apart than they were previously.

entries.title: Damar Hamlin’s GoFundMe Receives Over $8 Million, Here’s An Update On His Condition
entries.description: The Buffalo Bills provided an update on Damar Hamlin's condition, indicating that his breathing tube has been removed and that "he has been able to talk to his family and care team."

entries.title: A Psychologist Explains Why It’s Counterproductive To Map Out Your Career From Start To Finish
entries.description: While it is important to have goals, having a rigid, long-term career plan could affect your work fulfillment.

entries.title: HBO’s ‘The Last Of Us’ Won’t Tell Stories Past The Games, But Is ‘Part 3’ Coming?
entries.description: There is just one week left until the debut of The Last of Us on HBO, and while I haven’t…loved many of the quotes from Neil Druckmann in the run-up to its release, I am willing to give him the benefit of the doubt, and some newer ones are more reassuring.

entries.title: ‘Destiny 2’ Needs To Have Seasonal Roadmaps Again
entries.description: While I understand that the Destiny 2 community wanted to have a bit more kept under wraps, I’m not sure anyone took that to mean “we never wanted to have a seasonal roadmap again.”

entries.title: Like Polar Vortex, Atmospheric Rivers Are Being Mischaracterized
entries.description: Some characterizations of the atmospheric rivers affecting the U.S. West have been incorrect. Here's a proper description.

entries.title: ‘Redfall’ Isn’t ‘Left 4 Dead’ Or ‘Borderlands,’ It’s ‘Far Cry,’ Says Creative Director
entries.description: Promotion for Redfall has been somewhat…limited, shall we say, even after its lengthy delay into 2023 when it was supposed to be out last summer.

entries.title: ‘Kaleidoscope’ Dethroned In Netflix’s Top 10 List By A New Show
entries.description: Here's what new show has knocked Kaleidoscope off the #1 spot in Netflix's top 10 list.

entries.title: ‘Elden Ring’ Figuarts Minis Toy Review: Reasonably Priced And Thoroughly Adorable
entries.description: A few months back we heard that Bandai Spirits had some lovely little Figuarts Mini toys from 'Elden Ring' on the way. Well, they are finally here and thoroughly adorable with it.

entries.description: Tesla will be announcing its next-generation platform for a smaller, cheaper electric car this year. Here's what we know about it plus some predictions.

entries.description: Recently I managed to have a go on the upcoming remake of Like a Dragon: Ishin! and it was very good indeed.

entries.title: See The Jaw-Dropping New 67 Million-Pixel Images Of A Nebula Giving Birth To Stars
entries.description: A stunning stellar nursery 6,000 light-years from Earth has been captured in intricate detail by the VISTA telescope in Chile.
